name: UMovieSceneCapture
doc: Class responsible for capturing scene data

Settings: Settings that define how to capture
bUseSeparateProcess: Whether to capture the movie in a separate process or not
bCloseEditorWhenCaptureStarts: When enabled, the editor will shutdown when the capture starts
AdditionalCommandLineArguments: Additional command line arguments to pass to the external process when capturing
InheritedCommandLineArguments: Command line arguments inherited from this process
ImageCaptureProtocol: Capture protocol responsible for actually capturing frame data

methods.name: GetImageCaptureProtocol
methods.doc: Access the capture protocol we are using
